Class SubServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • SubServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SubServer
extends java.lang.Thread
    A "mini-server" that handles communication on a separate thread from the CentralServer. Each SubServer communicates with a single client via Peer to Peer
    Author:
    Anantajit
